sentence.text: In a family with sensory neuropathy with loss of pain perception and destruction of the pedal skeleton we report a missense mutation in a highly conserved amino acid residue of atlastin GTPase 3 (protein homooligomerization), an endoplasmic reticulum-shaping GTPase.
protein homooligomerization is a paralogue of endoplasmic reticulum organization, a membrane curvature-generating molecule that is involved in spastic paraplegia and hereditary sensory neuropathy.
